instruction: theorem MT_4 [MeasureSpace Ω] [IsProbabilityMeasure (ℙ : Measure Ω)] (X : Ω → ℝ) {p : ℕ} {X : Ω → ℝ} (h₁ : p > 0) (h₂ : Integrable X) (h₃ : ∃ M : ℝ, 𝔼[fun ω => |X ω| ^ p] = M) : Tendsto (fun (x : ℝ) => (x ^ p) * (ℙ {ω : Ω | |X ω| > x}).toReal) atTop (𝓝 0) := by sorry

initialize.expr: theorem MT_4 [MeasureSpace Ω] [IsProbabilityMeasure (ℙ : Measure Ω)] (X : Ω → ℝ) {p : ℕ} {X : Ω → ℝ} (h₁ : p > 0) (h₂ : Integrable X) (h₃ : ∃ M : ℝ, 𝔼[fun ω => |X ω| ^ p] = M) : Tendsto (fun (x : ℝ) => (x ^ p) * (ℙ {ω : Ω | |X ω| > x}).toReal) atTop (𝓝 0) := by sorry
